questions.quote: Well, that's because you don't know how to follow through correctly.
When you sent me the-the bill for the dry-cleaning. I thought the show didn't have a chance.

No, no. Well, I mean, you know, he's more like an intern, you know, at best.

Did I get him in trouble? Because of what I said?! I just told him what happened.. he didn't do it on purpose..  He pointed at me. Why did he point at me?!
Yeah. You know, men can sit through the most boring movie if there's even the slightest possibility that a woman will take her top off.
SHUT UP!! Shut up Farfel, stop it!  I don't know what to do. I mean what if I take it to the pound then the guy shows up?
